Package io.micronaut.context

Class RequiresCondition

java.lang.Object
io.micronaut.context.RequiresCondition
All Implemented Interfaces:
Condition, Predicate<ConditionContext>
@NextMajorVersion("Make internal") public class RequiresCondition extends Object implements Condition
An abstract Condition implementation that is based on the presence of Requires annotation.
Since:
1.0.0
Author:
graemerocher
